name: Pressing Space Bar on "ADD" (in Add members to a channel) carries out the action

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: MISSING - TM4J-Key-Missing-In-Cypress - TM4J key NOT found in any Cypress run reports  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
Pressing Space Bar on "ADD" (in Add members to a channel) carries out the action
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Use CTRL+F6/F6 to navigate to the center channel header region
  2. TAB so that focus is on the channel name with 'v' to the right of it
  3. Press Enter to open the menu
  4. Press TAB to get to the Add Members option then press Enter
  5. Type the name of a user you want to add
  6. Use the down/up arrows to select the user then press Enter
  7. Use TAB to set focus on the ADD button
  8. Press Space Bar
inline.expectedResult: • User should be added to the channel

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• ADA: Screen reader reads 'Press space to activate' on Add button of Add Members to channel button when space doesn't trigger the button — MM-17094
  • (Task) Accessibility Cypress Test Automation: Accessibility Support in Modals & Dialogs — MM-22623
